title: 后台---什么问题这是
author: ddff19861221
txt_content:

22.10 13:58:30 [Server] 警告 To change this, set "online-mode" to "true" in the server.properties file.
22.10 13:58:30 [Server] 警告 While this makes the game possible to play without internet access, it also opens up the ability for hackers to connect with any username they choose.
22.10 13:58:30 [Server] 警告 The server will make no attempt to authenticate usernames. Beware.

22.10 13:58:30 [Server] 警告 iConomy - If you are using Flatfile storage be aware that versions 6, 7 and 8 have a CRITICAL bug which can wipe ALL iconomy data.

replies.author: ddff19861221
replies.txt_content:
22.10 13:58:30 [Server] 信息 Forge Mod Loader has successfully loaded 3 mods
22.10 13:58:30 [服务器]信息锻造模机已成功加载3多器官功能障碍综合征

22.10 13:58:30 [Server] 警告 To change this, set "online-mode" to "true" in the server.properties file.
22.10 13:58:30 [服务器]警告改变，集“在线模式”到“真实”的server.properties文件。

22.10 13:58:30 [Server] 警告 While this makes the game possible to play without internet access, it also opens up the ability for hackers to connect with any username they choose.
22.10 13:58:30 [服务器]警告，这使得游戏可玩不上网，它也开辟了黑客对他们选择的任何用户连接的能力。

22.10 13:58:30 [Server] 警告 The server will make no attempt to authenticate usernames. Beware.
22.10 13:58:30 [服务器]警告服务器将不试图验证用户名。当心。

22.10 13:58:30 [Server] 警告 **** SERVER IS RUNNING IN OFFLINE/INSECURE MODE!
22.10 13:58:30 [服务器]警告*服务器运行在脱机/非安全模式！

22.10 13:58:30 [服务器] [库] [权限]信息superpermissions加载备份许可制度。

22.10 13:58:30 [Server] 信息 [Vault][Permission] GroupManager found: Waiting

22.10 13:58:30 [Server] 警告 if you're using Votifier, or any other plugin which handles economy data in a threaded manner your server is at risk!
22.10 13:58:30 [服务器]警告如果你使用votifier，或任何其他插件处理经济数据在一个线程的方式你的服务器是危险的！

不需要理会
并不是什么错误信息
也并不是崩溃

不用认证账户，黑客攻击什么的？是啥意思，没有危险吗

ddff19861221 发表于 2014-10-24 00:04
不用认证账户，黑客攻击什么的？是啥意思，没有危险吗
除非你想开正版服务器
盗版服务器后台都会发这个警告。
